entry.data:
RAIN
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

RAIN
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
